mapper.select: select * from allergy_history_form where card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by allergy_id desc
select top 1 * from allergy_history_form order by allergy_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into allergy_history_form (allergy_id, card_id, allergen, describe) values (#{allergyId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{allergen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
